local_intent: Execute the staged transfer push: drive t_block 0.1m toward 180° after confirming visibility and contact alignment, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Object remains on tabletop and is observable
Pushing direction is specified by the action and does not require yaw change
coherence_with_global: Implements the second straight push (0.1m at 180°) following prior contact/align, consistent with the GLOBAL_BT staged pushing plan.
